title: Pretty disappointed
review: Huge huge fan of Steven Kings books especially It - this just doesn't work. The original worked way better. Penny-Wise just seemed too real! And I'm your face. I wasn't freaked out by him in the same way I was in the original.

title: Larson cannot run
review: I just can't understand why the critics gave this film anything! Jude Law and his gang are the only good thing about it and you'd think they would find a star who could run. Brie Larson looks like she had to go to athletic school for a crash course but didn't make it past the first jog!
